CustomField.description: When the action button label is provided, on click of button a survey participant is redirected to action button link URL. If label is empty, the action button is not displayed in the popup.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the action button label is provided, on click of button a survey participant is redirected to action button link URL. If label is empty, the action button is not displayed in the popup.
CustomField.label: Validation Popup Action Button Label
